display_long_description:
# NHL® Sense Arena 26™

**Off-Ice Hockey Training & VR Hockey Game**

Step into the future of **VR hockey** with **NHL Sense Arena 26™ + DanglePro**, the **ONLY VR hockey training platform officially licensed by the NHL®**. Built for players and goalies at every level, it’s the most advanced off-ice hockey training system ever built, designed to sharpen **hockey IQ, reaction time, hand-speed, and decision-making** from home.

# PLANS:
**UNLIMITED ACCESS**

 - Annual: $29/mo

 - Monthly: $59/mo

**3V3 NHL GAMES ONLY**

 - SA26 Game: $39.99 (one-time)

[media]

# NEW IN NHL SENSE ARENA 26™
- **Updated 2025–26 NHL Season Mode** – NHL teams, dream roster management, NHL player likenesses, and collectible player profiles

- **NHL Player Integration** – train in VR with real NHL players

- **New Goalie Game Flow shooters** – shots from BU, UConn, NTDP, Little Caesar’s, and Avalanche clubs

- **Updated DanglePro drills** – new obstacles, competitions, and mixed-reality stickhandling challenges


# TRAINING MODES
# 100+ VR hockey drills
- Built for both players & goalies to build hockey IQ for all skill levels and ages (10+)
- **Guided insights and drills in P.A.S. & G.A.P. training programs** for progressive development

[media]
# Game Flow for Goalies
- Build focus and stamina with uninterrupted shots from AI-assisted passes
- Three full periods of shots
- Real shooters

[media]

# DanglePro stickhandling training
- The most advanced stickhandling training tool
- Real puck, real space, virtual obstacles in mixed-reality

[media]

# **Train Smarter. Play Faster. Think the Game Better. With NHL Sense Arena 26™.**
